tweets.author_name: Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars
tweets.html:
WGN doing Ten Commandments mini. Each episode a different director. Gus Van Sant, Lee Daniels, Jim Sheridan, Wes Craven and... Michael Cera?

— Eric Goldman Likes the Star Wars (@TheEricGoldman) January 12, 2014

WGN is remaking The Decalogue for no particular reason?! I lack an adjective to properly describe this in all its awesome horror. #tca14

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) January 12, 2014

And it's from the Weinsteins?! How has this room not been consumed by ever-burning fire? #tca14

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) January 12, 2014

I want anthology drama to come back, but not like this. NOT LIKE THIS. #tca14

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) January 12, 2014

WGN wants to air shows that take you to a unique world or see that world through a unique prism, which is why they air the Cubs. #tca14

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) January 12, 2014

I just hope Michael Cera gets "Thou shalt have no other gods before me." Think of what he could do with it! #tca14

— Todd VanDerWerff (@tvoti) January 12, 2014

Does Michael Cera think THIS IS THE END was a prophecy and he's racing to atone?

First look at #Salem…imagine "AHS: Coven, The Early Years." With less Precious and more Shane West.

So U.S.history education worse than we thought? WGN's #Salem says witches were real and they ran the witch trials. #themoreyouknow #TCA14
